title: Document clean rebuild + redeploy procedure and troubleshooting for draft deployment errors

requirements.text: Update the deployment documentation to include an explicit “clean rebuild and redeploy” procedure that clears local build artifacts/caches and then rebuilds + redeploys the project, including a short troubleshooting section for intermittent Caffeine draft deployment failures (e.g., retry guidance) and the known draft preview issue showing `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz`. All user-facing text in the docs must be in English.

quotes: trigger a clean rebuild and redeploy

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md` contains a clearly labeled section for performing a clean rebuild and redeploy, with concrete steps a developer can follow.
`frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md` includes a troubleshooting section that mentions intermittent platform-level draft deployment failures and recommends retrying a clean rebuild/redeploy when they occur.

The troubleshooting section mentions the known draft preview console error `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz` as a platform preview issue, without attributing it to application code.
All new/updated documentation text is written in English.

constraints: Do not edit any files under the immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not implement new application features or change existing UI/UX behavior as part of this request.
Do not add third-party integrations or external deployment tooling beyond what is already used by the project.
